jobDescription:
Job Description - Designs, develops and tests program units; works on SPA application in a micro-app architecture environment; participates in implementations of new systems or modifications to existing systems to meet Information Systems and client business requirements. Prepares and updates documentation as appropriate. Includes proficiency developing, debugging and optimizing web applications. Familiar with web standards, best practices and current trends.

Key skills (Must have):

RESTS APIs, JavaScript, ReactJS ,Node.js, Jest, Java, Python.
Significant javascript development experience within a major framework: Vue, Angular 2+, React.
Experience with SASS Unit testing with Jest, Mocha, Tape or other JS testing framework.
Awareness of DevOps and Agile principles
Familiarity with CI/CD and how to apply it with services such as Gitlab CI, Jenkins, CodePipeline, or Circle CI
Familiarity with Infrastructure-as-Code,such as Terraform or CloudFormation
Familiarity how public cloud services work and how different cloud services work together
Familiarity with Docker and how containers work and can be used
Familiarity with Kubernetes and other container orchestration systems
Minimum of 3 years of experience required due to job requirements. (3-5 recommended)
